main.name: Erlina
main.bio: Good morning, all. Let me introduce myself. My name is Erlina. I was born in Central Jakarta on 16 november 2000, but now I live in Kampung Rawa, Central Jakarta. I was the first child Music is one of my hobbies. I have played the guitar since 4th grade and now I have created 4 songs. My dream is to make a band and perform on the same stage with Coldplay.Thatâ€™s all from me. Thank you!
